description: Detects a suspicious execution of csc.exe, which uses a source in a suspicious folder (e.g. AppData) Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Csc.exe Source File Folder
query: ((process.executable:*\\csc.exe AND process.command_line:(*\\AppData\\* OR *\\Windows\\Temp\\*)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files* OR process.parent.executable:(*\\sdiagnhost.exe OR *\\w3wp.exe OR *\\choco.exe) OR process.parent.command_line:*\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\ Advanced\ Threat\ Protection*)))
